content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace used to process iron ore and coal into iron plates.
Operation noted:
• Inserted 10 iron ore and 10 coal, then extracted 30 iron plates.

### Copper Plate Production Unit at Position(–27.0, –60.0)
Consists of:
– A copper furnace used to convert copper ore into copper plates.
Operation noted:
• Received 50 copper ore and 10 coal, then extracted 45 copper plates.

Note:
Attempts were made to locate, craft, and place a Lab at Position(0.5, 2.5) for Automation Science Pack supply, but all such efforts failed. No Lab structure is present on the map.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage Errors with get_entities:
 – Using a keyword argument (‘radius’) produced an “unexpected keyword argument” error.
 – Passing multiple positional arguments caused a TypeError (“takes 0 positional arguments but 3 were given”).
   Tip: Review the function’s signature and use only supported parameters.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures:
 – Errors when attempting to place a Lab (e.g. “Could not place lab at (0.5, 2.5), No lab in inventory”).
 – An iteration over a NoneType was attempted while filtering Lab entities.
 – Crafting failures occurred due to missing sub-ingredients (iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables) resulting in insufficient resources.
  Tip: Verify that the Lab is available in inventory and ensure all required sub-ingredients are sufficiently produced before initiating Lab crafting.

• Resource Shortage Issues:
 – Lab crafting did not succeed because key intermediate items were not available despite prior smelting operations.
  Tip: Monitor inventory levels and complete necessary resource conversion (smelting or crafting) for all required ingredients prior to reattempting Lab production.
